title: JavaScript
description: At Chas Academy, I mastered vanilla JS, deepening my understanding of syntax, modular code, and optimization. At Advenica, I applied these skills in real-world projects, refining best practices.

title: TypeScript
description: TS boosts readability and maintainability. My group project 'Quire' at Chas Academy was built entirely in TypeScript, strengthening my confidence in structured and scalable code. Nowadays, it's my go-to-language.

title: React
description: React’s component-based architecture has changed my approach to frontend development. At Chas Academy and Advenica, I built scalable, reusable UI components and dynamic web apps.

title: Java
description: Java was my introduction to coding at Chas Academy, sparking my passion for development. While not my main focus, I appreciate its structured and object-oriented approach.

title: Vue.js
description: Vue’s reactivity system and lightweight structure make it a great framework for building fast, efficient applications. I’m eager to apply its strengths in real projects.

title: Git
description: Git is second nature. Through group projects at Chas Academy and real-world scenarios at Advenica, I’ve mastered version control, conflict resolution, and structured branching strategies.

title: GitHub
description: GitHub feels like home. I’ve used it extensively for collaboration, code reviews, and workflow management in projects at Chas Academy and during my internship at Advenica.

title: Agile Working Methods
description: Working with Scrum, Kanban, and Extreme Programming at Chas Academy and Advenica gave me hands-on experience in agile workflows and real-world team dynamics.

title: Node.js
description: Backend development fascinates me! At Chas Academy, I’ve built APIs and explored authentication, databases, and server-side logic using Node.js.

title: Figma
description: Figma is an essential tool in my UI/UX workflow. From wireframing to prototyping, I use it to create intuitive designs that translate seamlessly into code.

title: HTML
description: HTML is the foundation of my web development skills. At Chas Academy and Advenica, I’ve created well-structured, semantic, and accessible layouts.

title: CSS
description: I love pushing CSS boundaries! From responsive layouts to animations, I continuously refine my styling skills to create modern, visually striking designs.

title: SQL
description: SQL is key for managing structured data efficiently. I am becoming more familiar and comfortable with relational databases, queries, and optimization techniques for scalable backend solutions.

title: Python
description: Python’s simplicity and versatility make it an excellent language for problem-solving, automation, and backend development.

title: Docker
description: Docker enables efficient containerization and deployment. I’m eager to deepen my understanding of DevOps workflows and scalable infrastructure.

title: Jira
description: Jira helps me manage projects efficiently. I understand its ticketing system, sprint planning, and workflow customization for agile development.

title: C++
description: C++ is a powerful language for performance-driven applications. I appreciate its low-level control and efficiency in system programming.

title: Express.js
description: Express simplifies backend development. I’ve built RESTful APIs, handled middleware, and improved my understanding of server-side architecture.

title: MongoDB
description: MongoDB’s flexibility in handling unstructured data makes it perfect for modern applications. I’ve worked with queries, indexing, and schema design.

title: AWS
description: AWS provides scalable cloud solutions. I’m eager to gain hands-on experience with its infrastructure, services, and deployment strategies.

title: Redux
description: Redux was challenging at first, but now I see its value in managing global state efficiently, reducing prop drilling, and improving app performance.

title: Prisma
description: Prisma makes database interactions effortless. I’ve used it to define schemas, manage migrations, and write efficient queries with TypeScript.

title: Docusaurus
description: Docusaurus has been my go-to tool for transforming Advenicas old documentation site, to something far more dynamic and user-friendly. I’ve used it to create structured, professional, and well-maintained developer docs for Advanica's Knowledge Base.
